unnormalised: Arre yaar, return policies can be such a headache, no? Last Diwali, I bought a kurta from Chandni Chowk online, but the size was totally off. Getting a refund felt like navigating a Delhi traffic jam! Companies should be transparent, like how my local kirana store operates. Imagine returning a biryani because it's too spicy, haha! Onam's coming, hopefully, returns will be smoother this time.
